home.desc-societe-1: Innovative New Education Systems, is a distance education platform that constitutes an effective means of accompaniment at the same time of the parents and the pupils to pass the review and memorization and the exercises of the courses at home. It is also a free way for primary schools to properly monitor the levels of their students and the effectiveness of their teachers as well as the qualities of the teach they offer. I.N.E.S academy is an out-of-school support platform. It's a platform for reviewing at home knowledge, knowledge and practices acquired at school.
home.desc-societe-2:
Leader in the field of geolocation by GPS/GPRS, our company is committed to delivering turnkey solutions with high added value. 
Indeed, vehicle fleet management tools for businesses are useful in several ways. 
First, these solutions allow for better financial control. 
Through a set of scalable functions, geolocation tools allow companies to significantly reduce costs and make their investments more profitable. 
In addition, gps tracking solutions improve the safety of vehicle fleet activities and this at a lower cost!
home.desc-societe-3:
Geo-Tracking is a company based in Tunis since 2011. Subsidiary of the French group ID-Tracking, the company specializes in the development of new technologies for the geolocation of your fleets. Geo-Tracking is founded with a view to 
offer a high-performance fleet tracking system to as many companies as possible. 
Geo-Tracking strives to offer the most competitive and scalable geolocation solutions to meet all the professional needs of companies in Tunisia. 
Aware of the challenges of this target, Geo-Tracking offers services that comply with international standards.
